That's a great approach! Mixing everything together in a big bowl will allow the flavors to meld together beautifully, and it'll be easy for people to serve themselves at the potluck. Plus, it's a fruit salad, so it's meant to be a refreshing and casual dish.

By mixing everything together, you'll also ensure that each bite has a good balance of sweet, tangy, and creamy elements. The honey lime dressing will tie everything together, and the Greek yogurt will add a nice cooling touch.

Now that we've got the prep and assembly plan sorted, I think you're all set for a delicious and refreshing fruit salad! If you have any other questions or need any more assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your potluck goes amazingly well, and your fruit salad is a huge hit!
